text: Bunnytown is an American children's television show that aired on Playhouse Disney. It was shown in the United States on November 10, 2007. It got generally good reviews from critics. It was made by David Rudman, his brother Adam, and Todd Hannert, under the Spiffy Pictures television production- channel company. The show was filmed at Elstree Studios. title: Bunnytown
